designed to be worn with approximately 0-2 in 0-5 cm of negative ease meaning the circumference of the pullover is approximately 0-2 in 0-5 cm smaller than your bust when the collar is unstretched it is intended to have 8 5-11 in 21 5-28 cm of negative ease at the horizontal circumference of your body below the shoulders specifically at the top of the crease where your arms separate from your body
